name: @finanzritter/nativescript-pdf-view
description: A basic PDF viewer plugin for NativeScript, to display PDF documents on iOS and Android.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run prepare.demo && cd ../demo && ns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run prepare.demo && cd ../demo && ns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run prepare.demo && cd ../demo && ns run android --emulator
scripts.demo.android.device: npm run prepare.demo && cd ../demo && ns run android
scripts.demo-vue.ios: npm run prepare.demo-vue && cd ../demo-vue && ns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo-vue.ios.device: npm run prepare.demo-vue && cd ../demo-vue && ns run ios
scripts.demo-vue.android: npm run prepare.demo-vue && cd ../demo-vue && ns run android --emulator
scripts.demo-vue.android.device: npm run prepare.demo-vue && cd ../demo-vue && ns run android
scripts.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && ns plugin remove @finanzritter/nativescript-pdf-view && ns plugin add ../src && ns install && cd ../demo-vue && ns plugin remove @finanzritter/nativescript-pdf-view && ns plugin add ../src && ns install && cd ../src
scripts.prepare.demo: npm run build && cd ../demo && ns plugin remove @finanzritter/nativescript-pdf-view && ns plugin add ../src && ns install
scripts.prepare.demo-vue: npm run build && cd ../demo-vue && ns plugin remove @finanzritter/nativescript-pdf-view && ns plugin add ../src && ns install
scripts.setup: npm ci && ts-patch install && npm run setup.demo && npm run setup.demo-vue && npm run prepare
